methods.name: getUndefinedDataType
methods.comment: Get an Undefined data-type instance of the requested size

params.name: size
params.comment: data type size, sizes greater than 8 will cause an Undefined1[size] (i.e., Array) to be returned.

methods.name: isUndefined
methods.comment:
Determine if the specified dataType is either a DefaultDataType, 
 an Undefined data-type, or an Array of Undefined data-types.

return.comment:
true if dataType represents an undefined data-type in
 its various forms, else false.

methods.name: isUndefinedArray
methods.comment:
Determine if the specified dataType is an undefined array
 used to represent large undefined data.

return.comment:
true if the specified dataType is an undefined array
 used to represent large undefined data, otherwise false.

name: Undefined
comment: Undefined identifies an undefined data type
